# The `MethodWrapperHandler` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A function object that takes an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/executoraddr">ExecutorAddr</a> as its first argument, casts that address to a ClassT&#42;, then calls the given method on that pointer passing in the remaining function arguments. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A function object that takes an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/executoraddr">ExecutorAddr</a> as its first argument, casts that address to a ClassT&#42;, then calls the given method on that pointer passing in the remaining function arguments.

This utility removes some of the boilerplate from writing wrappers for method calls.
